entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Please give users a choice to disable implicit usings and nullable before code is generated #73901
  • Proposal: Flow attributes on primary constructor parameters to generated fields/properties #73899
  • Remove usage of IGlobalOptionService from test helpers on Features layer and below #73898
  • Parameter names in target-typed new() expressions are missing among completions in compound assignment statements #73894
    Backlog
  • `Remove unused using` showing up multiple times in lightbulb #73893
    17.11 P3
  • Edit.Duplicate command does not insert trailing newline between original and duplicated code #73891
  • There is either a test gap, or an unnecessary attempt to lookup a local in a map in ClosureConversion #73889

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35006.210 #73890

PullRequests

Created

  • Update the code style package to build against Roslyn 4.8 #73900
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid running generators when nothing has changed in a compilation tracker. #73897
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Apply editorconfig settings to moved ExternalAccess #73896
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [cherry-pick] Use separate async tracker for SG work instad of reusing workspace async tracker #73895
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Upgrade MicrosoftCodeAnalysisTestingVersion to 1.1.2-beta1.24121.1 #73892
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • ExternalAccess layering #73887
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Change global option change notification to batch all option changes #73882
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to workspace service to ensure the analyzer loader uses streams on linux #73809
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Support offering 'use collection' expr when assigning a List<T> to an IList<T> #73884
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use separate async tracker for SG work instad of reusing workspace async tracker #73880
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add struct base enumerator for interval trees. #73877
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Update MicrosoftDevDivOptimizationDataPowerShellVersion to 1.0.803 #73841
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Global options #73808
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove semantic model keep-alive code in completion #73844
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • ChildSyntaxList.ItemInternal optimization #73650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers() #73794
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Delay reporting of pattern-based using diagnostics #73850
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, untriaged
  • Follow up on added ability to rewrite symbol references in BoundTreeRewriter. #73886
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Do not report warnings because there is non-array params candidate among applicable dynamic candidates. #73829
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Upgrade MicrosoftCodeAnalysisTestingVersion to 1.1.2-beta1.24121.1 #73840
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Prevent IDE0290 (convert to primary constructor) in ref struct #73869
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
